alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 22 at 3:48AM HST until January 24 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .A large west-northwest (280-310 degrees) will slowly ease today, then trend back up tonight through Tuesday as a similar west- northwest swell arrives. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores. * WHEN...Surf will slowly ease today, then trend back up tonight through Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
